snippet: Japan’s soaring national debt has reached a new milestone, surpassing one quadrillion yen. That’s a one followed by 15 zeros. The mind boggles.
abstract: Japan’s soaring national debt, already more than twice the size of its economy, has reached a new milestone, surpassing one quadrillion yen, or number one followed by 15 zeros.
lead_paragraph: Japan’s soaring national debt has reached a new milestone, surpassing one quadrillion yen. That’s a one followed by 15 zeros. The mind boggles.

headline.main: Japan’s Debt Looks Like This: 1,000,000,000,000,000 Yen
headline.print_headline: Japan’s Debt Looks Like This: 1,000,000,000,000,000 Yen
